text: ABS-CBN is a television network in the Philippines owned and operated by ABS- CBN Corporation. It is the country's largest and leading television network with an advertising revenues amounted to PHP17.5 billion for 2011. It was launched on 23 October 1953 and is among the first commercial television networks in Asia. Its headquarters is in Quezon City. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:20th-century establishments in the Philippines Category:1953 establishments in Asia Category:1970s disestablishments in Asia Category:1972 disestablishments Category:1986 establishments in the Philippines Category:2020 disestablishments in Asia Category:Disestablishments in the Philippines Category:Quezon City Category:Television networks in the Philippines
title: ABS-CBN
